teach2000.model.users

Class UserList

  • java.lang.Object
    • teach2000.model.users.UserList

  • public class UserList
extends java.lang.Object
    This class functions as a wrapper around an ArrayList to contain and store all User objects in memory. When created, it will automatically import all users from disk. The UserList is kept as a static variable since it will always contain the information stored in the file. There aren't any variations possible.
    Author:
    demacryx on 25.02.2018 9:28 PM.
